title: The Weaver's Reflection
description: A 'Mirrored-Pool' in the High-Forest is showing things that haven't happened yet. The Weaver wants a look.

turns.narrative: The Mirrored-Pool is a perfect circle of liquid silver, surrounded by trees made of white bone. The water doesn't reflect the sky; it reflects a city on fire, and then, a city made of gold.
turns.choice_a: Peer into your own future (Wis Save DC 13)
turns.consequence_a: Success: You see yourself standing atop a mountain of books. (+1 Secret)
turns.consequence_b: Success: The water ripples, revealing a map to a hidden temple. (+1 Lore)
turns.convergence: A 'Reflection' of yourself—made of starlight and shadow—steps out of the pool.

turns.narrative: The Reflection is beautiful and terrifying. It doesn't move like you; it moves with a fluid, pre-determined grace. 'The threads are tangled,' it whispers.
turns.consequence_a: Success: It reveals that a 'Scourge-Anchor' is buried beneath the pool. (+1 Progress)
turns.choice_b: Challenge the Reflection to a duel (Atk DC 14)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You exchange blows, each one echoing in your mind. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The trees around the pool begin to weep a violet sap that tastes like electricity.

turns.narrative: The sap is attracting 'Void-Butterflies'—tiny, flickering insects that eat the 'Possibilities' of the future. The pool's reflection is becoming blurry.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You clear the air. (+100 XP)
turns.choice_b: Capture a butterfly in a jar (Dex DC 14)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You gain a 'Butterfly of Fate'. (+1 Loot)
turns.convergence: The Reflection points to the center of the pool. A 'Logic-Node' is rising from the silver depths.

turns.narrative: The Logic-Node is a complex, clockwork sphere that dictates the 'Probabilities' of the region. It's being choked by a 'Scourge-Vine'.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You restore the proper flow of time. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: The vine shrieks and withers, but the Node is slightly charred. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The Reflection merges back with the pool, leaving behind its 'Star-Cloak' on the bank.

turns.narrative: The Forest is silent now. The sap has stopped weeping. You feel a strange, hollow sensation in your chest, as if a part of your future was just deleted.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You regain your sense of destiny. (+100 XP)
turns.choice_b: Dive into the pool to see the Anchor (Str DC 15)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You find a 'Silver-Vessel' at the bottom. (+1 Loot)
turns.convergence: A 'Forest-Spirit'—a deer with antlers of crystal—emerges from the white trees.

turns.narrative: The Spirit is the guardian of the pool. It's angry that you've 'touched' the future. It charges, its antlers glowing with a blinding white light.
turns.consequence_a: Success: It bow its head, allowing you to pass. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You avoid the lethal antlers. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The Spirit dissolves into a thousand white petals, leaving behind a 'Crystal-Antler-Shard'.

turns.narrative: You're holding the Star-Cloak and the Shard. The pool is now reflecting the 'Real' world—a group of Council Guards approaching your position.
turns.choice_a: Hide in the white trees (Stealth DC 14)
turns.consequence_a: Success: The guards pass by without seeing you. (+1 Progress)
turns.choice_b: Stand your ground and explain your presence
turns.consequence_b: Success: They recognize you as a hero of the state. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The Guard-Captain offers to escort you back to the city, but he's looking at the Star-Cloak with greed.

turns.narrative: The Captain hints that the Star-Cloak could 'buy a lot of favors' in the High-Ward. He's subtly threatening to arrest you for 'Treason against Time'.
turns.consequence_a: Success: He lets you go, but you lose a 'Truth-Coin'. (+1 Secret)
turns.consequence_b: Success: He backs down, fearing the divine wrath. (+5 Reputation)
turns.convergence: You return to the city as the stars begin to fall, each one a tiny miracle.

turns.narrative: You reach the tavern. The Chronicle Weaver is there, waiting in the shadows. He wants to know what you saw in the pool.
turns.consequence_a: Success: He rewards you with 'A Weaver's Thread'. (+1 Rare Item)
turns.consequence_b: Success: He sees through your lie but respects your privacy. (+1 Luck)
turns.convergence: The Star-Cloak begins to fade, its power now a part of your own aura.

turns.narrative: The sun rises. You look in a mirror, and for a split second, your reflection doesn't match your movements. It's smiling.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You are in harmony with the future. (+20 Morale)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You choose to live in the present. (+1 Luck)

conclusion: The Weaver's Reflection was a peek behind the curtain of fate. You saved the pool, but the future is no longer a single, straight line.

risk_matrix.penalty: Future corrupted. -5 Luck and a permanent 'Unstable' tag (Disadvantage on your next 3 rolls).
risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor consequences.

permanent_effects.settlement: Logic-Node restored; pool becomes divination site
